lines.text: Gee, trains are wonderful, especially at night. They're like big, long snakes with lighted skins. And they whistle and smoke and rattle. Boy, they're somethin'.
Some girl got herself killed on the Limited. Found her on the rear platform. Nail file, like that. Right through the heart.
There's no sense in scaring the boy.
He should be scared. I'm scared with him alone heaven knows where. If scaring will scare him, he should be scared.
I'll give him a good talkin-to, just like a big brother.
You're very pretty when your lips aren't moving.
Would you like to try a game of checkers?
Any more news about the gal who had her heart manicured?
You're pretty awful. You're even too bad for me.
